info.title: OTData
info.description:
OTData structure
- The authentication is specified by the interface operator.
- The customer is specified by the authentication.

basicAuth.description:
HTTP Basic Authentication
Username: username@consumernumber
Password: userpassword

IO OAuth.description:
InternetOrtung OAuth Authentication
Username: username@consumernumber
Password: userpassword

get.description:
If no deviceid exists, all vehicles are returned,
If no utcf exists, all data will be returned till the time utct,
If no utct exists, all data will be returned from utcf till now,
if nothing exists, all data are returned to the customer, 
to the customer

get.description:
Get the matching DDD file.

1. Get the latest ones
    - ALL: class = 3, rest leave blank
    - Vehicles: class=2, rest leave blank
    - Driver: class=1, rest leave blank
2. Get all since date
  - ALL: class = 3, date = value
  - Vehicles: class=2, date = value
  - Driver: class=1, date = value
3. Specification
  - add vin or driveridentnumber to get the matching ddd file, rest like step 1 or 2

example 1

  - class: 3
  - response: All actually DDD files
  
example 2 
  - class: 3
  - date: 2019-05-21T17:32:28Z
  - response: All ones which newer than 2019-05-21T17:32:28Z

example 3
  - class: 2
  - date: 2019-05-21T17:32:28Z
  - identification: WVWZZZ1JZ3W386752 
  - response: All ones which newer than 2019-05-21T17:32:28Z and matching the identification

parameters.name: identification
parameters.description:
It is an optional field to get specific DDD files,
Driver or vehicle
identification

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Receive all DDD files, which newer then date.
Leave empty, you'll get the newest.
ISO8601 Date time. 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

plate_number.description: The plate number from the vehicle

receiverid.description: Receicer ID register opentelematics number from receiver

receivetime.description:
ISO8601 Date time. 
Date Time of message recive (optional)

fuellevel.description: Fule level primary, secondary, ... tank in %

wettankpressure.description: Wet tank air pressure in kPa

pto.description: 0=no PTO drive is engaged, 1=at least one PTO drive is engaged, 2=error (cant read), 3=n/a

totalvehiclewocrcontr.description: Total vehicle distance with cruise control

items.description: 0=normal / 1=15 min. bef. 4 1/2h / 2=4 1/2h reached / 3=15 min bef. 9h / 4=9h reached / 5=15min bef. 16h / 6=16h reached / 14=Error / 15=n/a

cruisetime2.description: Total cruise time w/o acceleration pedal sec.

cruisedistance2.description: Total cruise distance w/o acceleration pedal km

status.description: 0=OK, 1=out of adjustment, 2=Delay breake return, 3=break pads worn, 4= delayed break application, 5=reserved, 6=error, 7 = n/a

receiverid.description: Receicer ID register opentelematics number from receiver

eta.description:
ISO8601 Date time. 
Estimated time of arrival
